nutanix_dashboard_install_node_descripti: You are about to install AOS and AHV on your node. Specify unused IP addresses in your cluster network.
nutanix_dashboard_install_node_tips: For simultaneous installation on multiple nodes, please use the API
nutanix_dashboard_install_node_success_b: Your installation request has been processed. This operation may take up to 1 hour
nutanix_dashboard_install_node_error_ban: The installation request did not complete successfully. If the error persists, please contact support
nutanix_dashboard_install_ip_unique_erro: This IP is already used on this cluster
nutanix_dashboard_install_ip_not_in_cidr: The addresses are not on the same network.
nutanix_dashboard_install_ip_format_erro: The IP format is not correct
nutanix_dashboard_install_ip_tooltip: The IP address must be included in the cluster subnet.
